Directions: Place chicken in a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish. In a bowl, combine rice and water. In another bowl, combine soups, soup mix and peas; stir into rice mixture. Spread over chicken. Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 40 minutes. Uncover; sprinkle with parsley. Bake 10-15 minutes longer or until chicken juices run clear.
Ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of celery soup, undiluted
